messages.title: Working hard for PUDDLETOWN WARD
messages.content: I have represented the Puddletown Ward for 8 years. I am seeking your support to continue.

messages.title: Securing Britain's Future
messages.content: Since you first elected me as your local MP in 1997, I have moved us in every aspect of life in West Dorset.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for Recreation Ground Improvement Project, restoration of The Old Chapel in Tolpuddle, major changes and improvements in recycling, reduction in refuse waste being put into landfill.
Domestic scale green energy installations where appropriate.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Opposition to Industrial Scale Wind Turbines
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I oppose Industrial Scale Wind Turbines in our Heritage Landscapes and Countryside.
Against the Silver Hill Project in Eyewell Green. Trying to preserve the area's tranquility.
Support businesses and our local economy to provide secure jobs.
Protect rural bus services, improve our transport networks, and increase our flood defences.
Support our local NHS services and get fairer funding for our local schools.
Help individual constituents when they have battles with bureaucracies.
Promote neighbourhood plans to give each area greater power over detailed planning decisions.
Seek to preserve the special character of West Dorset.

issues.economy: Support businesses and our local economy to provide secure jobs.
issues.education: Get fairer funding for our local schools.
issues.environment: Domestic scale green energy installations where appropriate. Opposition to Industrial Scale Wind Turbines in our Heritage Landscapes and Countryside.
issues.health: Support our local NHS services and get fairer funding for our local schools.

contactInformation.address: Althea House, Athelhampton, Dorchester, Dorset DT2 7LG

images.caption: Patrick Cooke working for Puddletown Ward
Oliver Letwin - Re-Elect Oliver Letwin Securing Britain's Future
